title: The Three I’s of Liberalism
author: VD
content_html:
I just turned in next week’s column. Since some of you will probably be out and about, I thought I’d give you a hint of what it is. Feel free to guess what they are; the answer will be revealed on Monday.

And, as always, by “liberal” I mean American left-liberalism. Language transforms over time, better to light a candle and deal with it than curse the linguistic darkness.
